name: Odin's Hanging
description:
There is a god hanging from a tree. His best friend needs help getting him down. 

Hear a story about Odin and Loki, sworn blood brothers, and the stupid lengths they go to help each other out and commit a deed for the ages.

Story written by Cardinal. 

Game-testing by Matt. J. McCormick.

Cover image by W.G. Collingwood (1908) from MyNDIR.
